name.baseName: Welding ; Welded parts ; Solid core welding wire ; Carbon dioxide shielded welding, submerged arc welding, argon arc welding ; All sizes; NESPS2
焊接 ; 焊接件 ; 实芯焊丝 ; 二氧化碳保护焊、埋弧焊、氩弧焊 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 此工业过程包括使用实芯焊丝进行所有规模焊接件的二氧化碳保护焊、埋弧焊和氩弧焊操作。这些焊接过程适用于需要金属连接的各个领域，如建筑、汽车、航空航天和制造业。相关的末端管理技术用于控制颗粒物排放（PM2.5 - PM10），包括板式静电除尘器、管式过滤器、移动式除尘器、袋式过滤器、喷雾塔/水冲击浴、多管旋风除尘器和单筒旋风除尘系统。这些技术在工业环境中实施，以减少污染，确保符合环保标准并保护空气质量。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码33-37文件，在完整版文件中第981页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isOthers (mobile dust purifier)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isTubular filtration，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是管式，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

源文件中描述为为实芯焊丝，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isSpray tower/water shock bath，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是喷淋塔/冲击水浴，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isMulti-tube cyclone dust removal，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是多管旋风，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isSingle cylinder (multiple cylinders in parallel) cyclone，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是单筒（多筒并联）旋风，其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isDirect discharge
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是直排，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
